dmca.title: [Ticket#2007051410000961] DMCA Complaint from LG Electronics for fotoconnection.com
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Barbara Davis [mailto:bdavis@netenforcers.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, May 16, 2007 2:17 PM
To: Response, Legal
Subject: FW: [Ticket#2007051410000961] DMCA Complaint from LG
Electronics for fotoconnection.com

ThePlanet.com,
 
I have rechecked www.fotoconnection.com and found the same two
infringing
URL's in violation of LG's copyrighted text.  Text is a creative
description written about a product to support the sale of a product.  I
have attached two PDF files with the infringing material circled in red.
Please email me at Bdavis@netenforcers.com if you or your client,
www.fotoconnection.com should have any questions.

Copyright (text) violations
 
http://www.fotoconnection.com/viewitem.php?IndexID=52170&RefTag=guideste
r&GSID=98117621&GSESID=cyxiniybf3zupnn1xdtqmy45&GSCID=2

http://www.fotoconnection.com/viewitem.php?IndexID=58098&RefTag=guideste
r&GSID=98117621&GSESID=cyxiniybf3zupnn1xdtqmy45&GSCID=2

 
Thank you,

Barbara Davis
LMS Manager
Net Enforcers Inc.
BDavis@netenforcers.com 
compliance.management@netenforcers.com 
The Online Enforcement Specialists......
Statement of Confidentiality
The contents of this e-mail message and any attachments are confidential
and are intended solely for the addressee. The information may also be
legally privileged. This transmission is sent in trust, for the sole
purpose of delivery to the intended recipient. If you have received this
transmission in error, any use, reproduction or dissemination of this
transmission is strictly prohibited. If you are not the intended
recipient, please immediately notify the sender by reply e-mail and
delete this message and its attachments, if any. Thank you.


-----Original Message-----
From: Compliance Management
[mailto:compliance.management@netenforcers.com] 
Sent: Monday, May 14, 2007 4:40 PM
To: Barbara Davis
Subject: Re: [Ticket#2007051410000961] DMCA Complaint from LG
Electronics for fotoconnection.com


Your Ticket-Team

 -
 Barbara Davis 

--
 Super Support - Waterford Business Park
 5201 Blue Lagoon Drive - 8th Floor & 9th Floor - Miami, 33126 USA
 Email: hot@example.com - Web: http://www.example.com/
--
---- Forwarded message from legal-response@theplanet.com ---

From: legal-response@theplanet.com
To: compliance.management@netenforcers.com, copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: DMCA Complaint from LG Electronics for fotoconnection.com
Date: 2007-05-14 11:30:03

> To Whom It May Concern:
> 
> This letter confirms that access to the materials referenced in your
> below-pasted complaint has been disabled.
> 
> Legal Response Team
> The Planet
> 
> 
> 
> ---------
> 
>

once
